018package org.opengis.metadata;
019
020import org.opengis.util.CodeList;
021import org.opengis.annotation.UML;
022import org.opengis.geoapi.internal.Vocabulary;
023
024import static org.opengis.annotation.Obligation.*;
025import static org.opengis.annotation.Specification.*;
026
027
028/**
029 * Datatype of element or entity.
030 *
031 * @author  Martin Desruisseaux (IRD)
032 * @version 3.1
033 * @since   2.0
034 */
035@Vocabulary(capacity=15)
036@UML(identifier="MD_DatatypeCode", specification=ISO_19115)
037public final class Datatype extends CodeList<Datatype> {
038    /**
039     * Serial number for compatibility with different versions.
040     */
041    private static final long serialVersionUID = -307310382687629669L;
042
043    /**
044     * Descriptor of a set of objects that share the same attributes, operations, methods,
045     * relationships, and behavior.
046     */
047    @UML(identifier="class", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
048    public static final Datatype CLASS = new Datatype("CLASS");
049
050    /**
051     * Flexible enumeration useful for expressing a long list of values, can be extended.
052     */
053    @UML(identifier="codelist", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
054    public static final Datatype CODE_LIST = new Datatype("CODE_LIST");
055
056    /**
057     * Data type whose instances form a list of named literal values, not extendable.
058     */
059    @UML(identifier="enumeration", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
060    public static final Datatype ENUMERATION = new Datatype("ENUMERATION");
061
062    /**
063     * Permissible value for a codelist or enumeration.
064     */
065    @UML(identifier="codelistElement", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
066    public static final Datatype CODE_LIST_ELEMENT = new Datatype("CODE_LIST_ELEMENT");
067
068    /**
069     * Class that cannot be directly instantiated.
070     */
071    @UML(identifier="abstractClass", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
072    public static final Datatype ABSTRACT_CLASS = new Datatype("ABSTRACT_CLASS");
073
074    /**
075     * Class that is composed of classes it is connected to by an aggregate relationship.
076     */
077    @UML(identifier="aggregateClass", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
078    public static final Datatype AGGREGATE_CLASS = new Datatype("AGGREGATE_CLASS");
079
080    /**
081     * Subclass that may be substituted for its superclass.
082     */
083    @UML(identifier="specifiedClass", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
084    public static final Datatype SPECIFIED_CLASS = new Datatype("SPECIFIED_CLASS");
085
086    /**
087     * Class with few or no operations whose primary purpose is to hold the abstract state
088     * of another class for transmittal, storage, encoding or persistent storage.
089     */
090    @UML(identifier="datatypeClass", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
091    public static final Datatype DATATYPE_CLASS = new Datatype("DATATYPE_CLASS");
092
093    /**
094     * Named set of operations that characterize the behavior of an element.
095     */
096    @UML(identifier="interfaceClass", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
097    public static final Datatype INTERFACE_CLASS = new Datatype("INTERFACE_CLASS");
098
099    /**
100     * Class describing a selection of one of the specified types.
101     */
102    @UML(identifier="unionClass", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
103    public static final Datatype UNION_CLASS = new Datatype("UNION_CLASS");
104
105    /**
106     * Class whose instances are classes.
107     */
108    @UML(identifier="metaClass", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
109    public static final Datatype META_CLASS = new Datatype("META_CLASS");
110
111    /**
112     * Class used for specification of a domain of instances (objects), together with the
113     * operations applicable to the objects. A type may have attributes and associations.
114     */
115    @UML(identifier="typeClass", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
116    public static final Datatype TYPE_CLASS = new Datatype("TYPE_CLASS");
117
118    /**
119     * Free text field.
120     */
121    @UML(identifier="characterString", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
122    public static final Datatype CHARACTER_STRING = new Datatype("CHARACTER_STRING");
123
124    /**
125     * Numerical field.
126     */
127    @UML(identifier="integer", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
128    public static final Datatype INTEGER = new Datatype("INTEGER");
129
130    /**
131     * Semantic relationship between two classes that involves connections among their instances.
132     */
133    @UML(identifier="association", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
134    public static final Datatype ASSOCIATION = new Datatype("ASSOCIATION");
135
136    /**
137     * Constructs an element of the given name.
138     *
139     * @param name  the name of the new element. This name shall not be in use by another element of this type.
140     */
141    private Datatype(final String name) {
142        super(name);
143    }
144
145    /**
146     * Returns the list of {@code Datatype}s.
147     *
148     * @return the list of codes declared in the current JVM.
149     */
150    public static Datatype[] values() {
151        return values(Datatype.class);
152    }
153
154    /**
155     * Returns the list of codes of the same kind as this code list element.
156     * Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking {@link #values()}, except that
157     * this method can be invoked on an instance of the parent {@code CodeList} class.
158     *
159     * @return all code {@linkplain #values() values} for this code list.
160     */
161    @Override
162    public Datatype[] family() {
163        return values();
164    }
165
166    /**
167     * Returns the datatype that matches the given string, or returns a new one if none match it.
168     * This methods returns the first instance (in declaration order) for which the {@linkplain #name() name}
169     * is {@linkplain String#equalsIgnoreCase(String) equals, ignoring case}, to the given name.
170     * If no existing instance is found, then a new one is created for the given name.
171     *
172     * @param  code  the name of the code to fetch or to create.
173     * @return a code matching the given name.
174     */
175    public static Datatype valueOf(String code) {
176        return valueOf(Datatype.class, code, Datatype::new).get();
177    }
178}
